titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice Institute Business Manager papers, 1874-1951 UA 353

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-10-26 17:09:56 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.abstract: This collection documents not only the early years of the Rice Institute, but also the years the institute was in the planning stages and William Marsh Rice's involvement. The assets of the institute are also detailed.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: This collection documents not only the early years of the Rice Institute, but also the years the institute was in the planning stages and William Marsh Rice's involvement. The assets of the institute are also detailed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection documents not only the early years of the Rice Institute, but also the years the institute was in the planning stages and William Marsh Rice's involvement. The assets of the institute are also detailed.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection resided in the President's Office and was maintained by Carl MacDowell, Assistant to the President, 1976-1999. The materials were transferred to the archives in the early 2000s.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice Institute Business Manager's Papers UA 353, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Rice Institute Business Manager's Papers must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: These materials are open for research. Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Rice Institute Business Manager's Papers must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The papers are arranged in 10 series: Series I: President; Series II: Fellowships, Funds and Scholarships; Series III: Correspondence; Series IV: Financial; Series V: Property; Series VI: Rincon Field; Series VII: Rice Lumber Co.; Series VIII: Legal; Series IX: South Main Co.; Series X: Trustees
